abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: D.Va ejects out of her mech when it is destroyed.

abilities.name: Fusion Cannons
abilities.description: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload while still can headshot, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air. Uses a resource meter that recharges automatically when not in use.

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: D.Va/'s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Micro Missles
abilities.description: D.Va fires a barrage of small rockets that detonate on impact, dealing splash damage to both herself and her enemies in a limited radius around each explosion

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

abilities.name: Light Gun (Pilot)
abilities.description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Call Mech (Pilot)
abilities.description: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.
